message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.SD, cs.MM

The paper deals with detecting comment spamming in online discussion forums, which is a common problem in online communities. This falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) as it involves identifying and preventing malicious behavior. The proposed technique involves mining comment activity logs and extracting patterns, which falls under information retrieval (cs.IR) and data mining (cs.SI) subcategories. The paper also deals with analyzing data crawled from YouTube, which falls under social networking and social media (cs.SD) and multimedia (cs.MM) subcategories.
